Add/Delete Virtual Interfaces
[Wireless Interface Accessors]

nl80211 routines to add/delete virtual interfaces. More...

Functions

int wapi_if_add (int sock, const char *ifname, const char *name, wapi_mode_t mode)
 Creates a virtual interface with name for interface ifname.
int wapi_if_del (int sock, const char *ifname)
 Deletes a virtual interface with name.

Detailed Description

nl80211 routines to add/delete virtual interfaces.

Some of these features require dedicated hardware to work properly. Since these features utilize nl80211 interface, sock arguments are there just for the function footprint uniformness purposes, hence are ignored totally.
